name: A Night On Watch
description:
CAN YOU SURVIVE THE HUNT?

The beast haunts you. If you can listen for its movements and predict its attacks, you just might make it to morning.

It was a chill night beneath a full, cloudless moon. I felt an air of unease as I set about my road watch, and I walked with a despairing fear of the unknown. Then I saw it—the moon devil. Its howl made my skin crawl, and its pallid eyes chased me far off into the dark.

My lantern slipped from my grasp when the beast's claws rent my flesh, but I scared it off with a startling shot from my pistol. I fired at shadowy figures as I bled from my wounds and limped through the woods without direction.

Then a glimmer of fortune favored me, and I stumbled upon an old woodsman's shack to hide in. I had little use left of my weapon, and I could not run far for long. It was there that I made my stand.

A Night On Watch is a short, challenging, holdout horror game where your ammunition is limited and the threats come fast.

Estimated playtime: ~20 minutes

Size once extracted: 582MB

Input: Mouse Only

CW: Blood
